original_text: People will come from the Negev. They will come to live in the mountains of Edom. People will come from the low hills in the west, and they will take the Philistines' country for themselves. They will live in the fields in Ephraim and Samaria. 1: Ephraim was the name that people used for the Northern Kingdom of Israel. Benjamin's people will take Gilead. People will come from the Negev. They will come to live in the mountains of Edom. People will come from the low hills in the west, and they will take the Philistines' country for themselves. They will live in the fields in Ephraim and Samaria. 1: Ephraim was the name that people used for the Northern Kingdom of Israel. Benjamin's people will take Gilead. People will come from the Negev. They will come to live in the mountains of Edom.
korean_text: 그들이 네겝과 에서의 산과 평지와 블레셋을 얻을 것이요 또 그들이 에브라임의 들과 사마리아의 들을 얻을 것이며 베냐민은 길르앗을 얻을 것이며

sentences.original_text: People will come from the Negev.
They will come to live in the mountains of Edom.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 에돔 산에서 살기 위해 올 것이다.

sentences.original_text: People will come from the low hills in the west,
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 서쪽의 낮은 언덕에서 올 것이며,

sentences.original_text: and they will take the Philistines' country for themselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 블레셋 사람의 나라를 자신들을 위해 차지할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: They will live in the fields in Ephraim and Samaria.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 에브라임과 사마리아의 들판에서 살 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Ephraim was the name that people used for the Northern Kingdom of Israel.
sentences.korean_translation: 에브라임은 사람들이 이스라엘 북왕국에 사용했던 이름이었다.

sentences.original_text: People will come from the Negev.
